participant_1.background:
I like people who are understanding of my diet and phobia.
I keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
I enjoy listening to Katy Perry while I cook and lift weights.
i am from georgia.

participant_2.background:
I have to lose weight so I can ride my horses again.
I have been working at my current job for three years, but my heart is still in the outdoors.
my husband is a pastor.
I love my leather clothes because they make me feel confident and powerful.
i hate flowers.

content.text: Hello!  How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking. Where are you from?
I'm from Georgia, but I've been working in a new state for the past three years.
Oh, that's nice! I'm from Georgia too! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time outdoors, especially riding horses. I also love gardening and cooking.
That sounds really fun! I love gardening too. I do a lot of weeding and yard work to keep fit.
I wish I could do more gardening, but I have to lose weight before I can ride my horses again.
I'm sure you'll get back to riding your horses soon! What do you like to listen to while you're gardening?
I love listening to Katy Perry! Her music is so upbeat and it gets me motivated.
I love Katy Perry too! She's so talented. What kind of clothes do you like to wear?
I love wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily.
I like wearing comfortable clothes too! I have to wear a wheelchair, so I need to be able to move around easily.
That's understandable. I'm glad you're able to find clothes that work for you.
Thank you! I like to wear a lot of floral prints, but my husband hates them.
That's funny! I hate flowers too. I think they're too feminine.
I guess we're opposites in that way! I love the way flowers look and smell.
I guess so! But I think we can both agree that Katy Perry is amazing!
